anya-e0102n8:69_2: Tattha ādito tettiṁsa vassāni paṭhamavayo nāma.
anya-e0102n8:69_6: ‘‘paṭhamavaye pavattaṁ rūpaṁ majjhimavayaṁ appatvā tattheva nirujjhati,
anya-e0102n8:69_12: Majjhimavaye pavattarūpampi pacchimavayaṁ appatvā tattheva nirujjhati,
anya-e0102n8:69_14: Pacchimavaye tettiṁsa vassāni pavattarūpampi maraṇato paraṁ gamanasamatthaṁ nāma natthi,
anya-e0102n8:69_15: tasmā tampi aniccaṁ dukkhamanattā’’ti tilakkhaṇaṁ āropeti.
anya-e0102n8:70_1: Evaṁ paṭhamavayādivasena vayovuḍḍhatthaṅgamato tilakkhaṇaṁ āropetvā puna ‘‘mandadasakaṁ,
anya-e0102n8:70_10: sayanadasaka’’nti imesaṁ dasannaṁ dasakānaṁ vasena vayovuḍḍhatthaṅgamato tilakkhaṇaṁ āropeti.
anya-e0102n8:71_0: Tattha dasakesu tāva vassasatajīvino puggalassa paṭhamāni dasa vassāni mandadasakaṁ nāma,
anya-e0102n8:71_1: tadā hi so mando hoti capalo kumārako.
anya-e0102n8:71_7: tadā hissa balañca thāmo ca vepullaṁ pāpuṇāti.
anya-e0102n8:71_10: pakatiyā kira dubbalapaññassāpi tasmiṁ kāle appamattakā paññā uppajjatiyeva.
anya-e0102n8:71_14: tadā hissa attabhāvo purato pabbhāro hoti.
anya-e0102n8:71_16: tadā hissa attabhāvo naṅgalakoṭi viya vaṅko hoti.
anya-e0102n8:72_0: Tatrāyaṁ yogī etesaṁ dasakānaṁ vasena vayovuḍḍhatthaṅgamato tilakkhaṇaṁ āropetuṁ iti paṭisañcikkhati –
anya-e0102n8:72_4: navamadasake pavattarūpaṁ dasamadasakaṁ appatvā tattheva nirujjhati.
anya-e0102n8:72_5: Dasamadasake pavattarūpaṁ punabbhavaṁ appatvā idheva nirujjhati,
anya-e0102n8:72_6: tasmā tampi aniccaṁ dukkhamanattā’’ti tilakkhaṇaṁ āropeti.
anya-e0102n8:73_1: Evaṁ dasakavasena vayovuḍḍhatthaṅgamato tilakkhaṇaṁ āropetvā puna tadeva vassasataṁ pañcapañcavassavasena
anya-e0102n8:73_2: vīsatikoṭṭhāse katvā vayovuḍḍhatthaṅgamato tilakkhaṇaṁ āropeti. Kathaṁ?
anya-e0102n8:73_4: ‘‘paṭhame vassapañcake pavattarūpaṁ dutiyaṁ vassapañcakaṁ appatvā tattheva nirujjhati,
anya-e0102n8:73_7: ekūnavīsatime vassapañcake pavattarūpaṁ vīsatimaṁ vassapañcakaṁ appatvā tattheva nirujjhati.
anya-e0102n8:73_8: Vīsatime vassapañcake pavattarūpaṁ maraṇato paraṁ gamanasamatthaṁ nāma natthi,
anya-e0102n8:74_0: Evaṁ vīsatikoṭṭhāsavasena vayovuḍḍhatthaṅgamato tilakkhaṇaṁ āropetvā puna pañcavīsati koṭṭhāse katvā catunnaṁ catunnaṁ vassānaṁ vasena āropeti.
anya-e0102n8:74_1: Tato tettiṁsa koṭṭhāse katvā tiṇṇaṁ tiṇṇaṁ vassānaṁ vasena,
anya-e0102n8:74_2: paññāsa koṭṭhāse katvā dvinnaṁ dvinnaṁ vassānaṁ vasena,
anya-e0102n8:74_4: Tato ekaṁ vassaṁ tayo koṭṭhāse katvā vassānahemantagimhesu tīsu utūsu ekekautuvasena tasmiṁ vayovuḍḍhatthaṅgamarūpe tilakkhaṇaṁ āropeti.
anya-e0102n8:75_1: ‘‘Vassāne catumāsaṁ pavattarūpaṁ hemantaṁ appatvā tattheva niruddhaṁ.
anya-e0102n8:75_2: Hemante pavattarūpaṁ gimhaṁ appatvā tattheva niruddhaṁ.
anya-e0102n8:75_3: Gimhe pavattarūpaṁ puna vassānaṁ appatvā tattheva niruddhaṁ,
anya-e0102n8:75_5: Evaṁ āropetvā puna ekaṁ vassaṁ cha koṭṭhāse katvā –
anya-e0102n8:75_6: ‘‘vassāne dvemāsaṁ pavattarūpaṁ saradaṁ appatvā tattheva niruddhaṁ.
anya-e0102n8:75_11: Gimhe pavattarūpaṁ puna vassānaṁ appatvā tattheva niruddhaṁ,
anya-e0102n8:75_12: tasmā aniccaṁ dukkhamanattā’’ti evaṁ tasmiṁ vayovuḍḍhatthaṅgamarūpe tilakkhaṇaṁ āropeti.
anya-e0102n8:76_2: Juṇhe pavattarūpaṁ kāḷaṁ appatvā tattheva niruddhaṁ,
anya-e0102n8:76_6: Divasaṁ pavattarūpampi rattiṁ appatvā tattheva niruddhaṁ,
anya-e0102n8:76_8: Tato tadeva rattindivaṁ pubbaṇhādivasena cha koṭṭhāse katvā –
anya-e0102n8:76_13: Majjhimayāme pavattarūpaṁ pacchimayāmaṁ appatvā tattheva niruddhaṁ.
anya-e0102n8:76_14: Pacchimayāme pavattarūpaṁ puna pubbaṇhaṁ appatvā tattheva niruddhaṁ,
anya-e0102n8:77_6: Samiñjane pavattarūpaṁ pasāraṇaṁ appatvā tattheva nirujjhati.
anya-e0102n8:78_0: Tato ekapadavāraṁ uddharaṇa atiharaṇavītiharaṇavossajjanasannikkhepanasannirumbhanavasena cha koṭṭhāse karoti.
anya-e0102n8:79_0: Tattha uddharaṇaṁ nāma pādassa bhūmito ukkhipanaṁ.
anya-e0102n8:79_2: Vītiharaṇaṁ nāma khāṇukaṇṭakadīghajātiādīsu kiñcideva disvā ito cito ca pādasañcāraṇaṁ.
anya-e0102n8:79_5: Sannirumbhanaṁ nāma puna pāduddharaṇakāle pādassa pathaviyā saddhiṁ abhinippīḷanaṁ.
anya-e0102n8:79_6: Tattha uddharaṇe pathavīdhātu āpodhātūti dve dhātuyo omattā honti mandā,
anya-e0102n8:79_9: Vossajjane tejodhātu vāyodhātūti dve dhātuyo omattā honti mandā,
anya-e0102n8:79_12: Evaṁ cha koṭṭhāse katvā tesaṁ vasena tasmiṁ vayovuḍḍhatthaṅgamarūpe tilakkhaṇaṁ āropeti.
anya-e0102n8:80_4: sabbe te dhammā atiharaṇaṁ appatvā ettheva nirujjhanti,
anya-e0102n8:80_9: Sannikkhepane pavattā sannirumbhanaṁ appatvā ettheva nirujjhanti.
anya-e0102n8:80_10: Iti tattha tattha uppannā itaraṁ itaraṁ koṭṭhāsaṁ appatvā tattha tattheva pabbaṁ pabbaṁ sandhi sandhi
anya-e0102n8:80_11: odhi odhi hutvā tattakapāle pakkhittatilā viya taṭataṭāyantā saṅkhārā bhijjanti.
anya-e0102n8:80_13: Tassevaṁ pabbapabbagate saṅkhāre vipassato rūpasammasanaṁ sukhumaṁ hoti.
anya-e0102n8:81_2: Eko kira dārutiṇukkādīsu kataparicayo adiṭṭhapubbapadīpo paccantavāsiko nagaramāgamma antarāpaṇe jalamānaṁ
anya-e0102n8:81_3: padīpaṁ disvā ekaṁ purisaṁ pucchi ambho ‘‘kiṁ nāmetaṁ evaṁ manāpa’’nti?
anya-e0102n8:81_5: padīpo nāmesa telakkhayena vaṭṭikkhayena ca gatamaggopissa na paññāyissatī’’ti.
anya-e0102n8:81_7: imissā hi vaṭṭiyā anupubbena ḍayhamānāya tatiyabhāge tatiyabhāge jālā itarītaraṁ padesaṁ appatvāva nirujjhissatī’’ti.
anya-e0102n8:81_9: imissā hi aṅgulaṅgulantare aḍḍhaṅgulaḍḍhaṅgulantare tantumhi tantumhi aṁsumhi aṁsumhi jālā itarītaraṁ aṁsuṁ appatvāva nirujjhissati.
anya-e0102n8:81_10: Aṁsuṁ pana muñcitvā na sakkā jālaṁ paññāpetu’’nti.
anya-e0102n8:82_0: Tattha ‘‘telakkhayena vaṭṭikkhayena ca padīpassa gatamaggopi na paññāyissatī’’ti purisassa ñāṇaṁ viya
anya-e0102n8:82_2: ‘‘Vaṭṭiyā tatiyabhāge tatiyabhāge jālā itarītaraṁ padesaṁ appatvāva nirujjhissatī’’ti purisassa ñāṇaṁ
anya-e0102n8:82_3: viya yogino vassasatassa tatiyakoṭṭhāsaparicchinne vayovuḍḍhatthaṅgamarūpe tilakkhaṇāropanaṁ.
anya-e0102n8:82_4: ‘‘Aṅgulaṅgulantare jālā itarītaraṁ appatvāva nirujjhissatī’’ti purisassa ñāṇaṁ viya yogino dasavassa
anya-e0102n8:82_5: pañcavassa catuvassa tivassa dvivassa ekavassa paricchinne rūpe tilakkhaṇāropanaṁ.
anya-e0102n8:82_6: ‘‘Aḍḍhaṅgulaḍḍhaṅgulantare jālā itarītaraṁ appatvāva nirujjhissatī’’ti purisassa ñāṇaṁ viya yogino ekekautuvasena ekaṁ vassaṁ tidhā,
anya-e0102n8:82_7: chadhā ca vibhajitvā catumāsa-dvimāsaparicchinne rūpe tilakkhaṇāropanaṁ.
anya-e0102n8:82_8: ‘‘Tantumhi tantumhi jālā itarītaraṁ appatvāva nirujjhissatī’’ti purisassa ñāṇaṁ viya yogino kāḷajuṇhavasena,
anya-e0102n8:82_10: ekarattindivaṁ cha koṭṭhāse katvā pubbaṇhādivasena ca paricchinne rūpe tilakkhaṇāropanaṁ.
anya-e0102n8:82_11: ‘‘Aṁsumhi aṁsumhi jālā itarītaraṁ appatvāva nirujjhissatī’’ti purisassa ñāṇaṁ viya yogino abhikkamādivasena
anya-e0102n8:82_12: ceva uddharaṇādīsu ca ekekakoṭṭhāsavasena paricchinne rūpe tilakkhaṇāropananti.
anya-e0102n8:83_1: So evaṁ nānākārehi vayovuḍḍhatthaṅgamarūpe tilakkhaṇaṁ āropetvā puna tadeva rūpaṁ visaṅkharitvā āhāramayādivasena
anya-e0102n8:83_2: cattāro koṭṭhāse katvā ekekakoṭṭhāse tilakkhaṇaṁ āropeti.
anya-e0102n8:83_3: Tatrāssa āhāramayaṁ rūpaṁ chātasuhitavasena pākaṭaṁ hoti.
anya-e0102n8:83_4: Chātakāle samuṭṭhitaṁ rūpaṁ hi jhattaṁ hoti kilantaṁ,
anya-e0102n8:83_6: aṅgārapacchiyaṁ nilīnakāko viya ca dubbaṇṇaṁ dussaṇṭhitaṁ.
anya-e0102n8:83_7: Suhitakāle samuṭṭhitaṁ dhātaṁ pīṇitaṁ mudu siniddhaṁ phassavantaṁ hoti.
anya-e0102n8:83_8: So taṁ pariggahetvā ‘‘chātakāle pavattarūpaṁ suhitakālaṁ appatvā ettheva nirujjhati.
anya-e0102n8:83_9: Suhitakāle samuṭṭhitampi chātakālaṁ appatvā ettheva nirujjhati,
anya-e0102n8:83_10: tasmā taṁ aniccaṁ dukkhamanattā’’ti evaṁ tattha tilakkhaṇaṁ āropeti.
anya-e0102n8:84_1: Uṇhakāle samuṭṭhitaṁ rūpaṁ hi jhattaṁ hoti kilantaṁ dubbaṇṇaṁ.
anya-e0102n8:84_2: Sītautunā samuṭṭhitaṁ rūpaṁ dhātaṁ pīṇitaṁ siniddhaṁ hoti.
anya-e0102n8:84_3: So taṁ pariggahetvā ‘‘uṇhakāle pavattarūpaṁ sītakālaṁ appatvā ettheva nirujjhati.
anya-e0102n8:84_4: Sītakāle pavattarūpaṁ uṇhakālaṁ appatvā ettheva nirujjhati,
anya-e0102n8:84_5: tasmā taṁ aniccaṁ dukkhamanattā’’ti evaṁ tattha tilakkhaṇaṁ āropeti.
anya-e0102n8:85_2: upatthambhakāni pana tesaṁ utucittāhārasamuṭṭhānāni catuvīsatīti catupaṇṇāsa honti.
anya-e0102n8:85_4: Kāyadvāre kāyabhāvadasakavasena ceva utusamuṭṭhānādivasena ca catucattālīsa.
anya-e0102n8:85_5: Manodvāre hadayavatthukāyabhāvadasakavasena ceva utusamuṭṭhānādivasena ca catupaṇṇāsameva.
anya-e0102n8:86_0: So sabbampi taṁ rūpaṁ pariggahetvā ‘‘cakkhudvāre pavattarūpaṁ sotadvāraṁ appatvā ettheva nirujjhati.
anya-e0102n8:86_4: Kāyadvāre pavattarūpaṁ manodvāraṁ appatvā ettheva nirujjhati,
anya-e0102n8:86_5: tasmā taṁ aniccaṁ dukkhamanattā’’ti evaṁ tattha tilakkhaṇaṁ āropeti.
anya-e0102n8:87_1: somanassitakāle uppannaṁ hi rūpaṁ siniddhaṁ mudu pīṇitaṁ phassavantaṁ hoti.
anya-e0102n8:87_2: Domanassitakāle uppannaṁ jhattaṁ kilantaṁ dubbaṇṇaṁ hoti.
anya-e0102n8:87_3: So taṁ pariggahetvā ‘‘somanassitakāle pavattarūpaṁ domanassitakālaṁ appatvā ettheva nirujjhati.
anya-e0102n8:87_4: Domanassitakāle pavattarūpaṁ somanassitakālaṁ appatvā ettheva nirujjhati,
anya-e0102n8:87_5: tasmā taṁ aniccaṁ dukkhamanattā’’ti evaṁ tattha tilakkhaṇaṁ āropeti.
anya-e0102n8:88_0: Tassevaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānarūpaṁ pariggahetvā tattha tilakkhaṇaṁ āropayato ayamattho pākaṭo hoti –
anya-e0102n8:89_0: Jīvitaṁ attabhāvo ca, sukhadukkhā ca kevalā;
anya-e0102n8:91_0: Cullāsīti sahassāni, kappaṁ tiṭṭhanti ye marū;
anya-e0102n8:92_0: Na tveva tepi tiṭṭhanti, dvīhi cittehi samohitā.
anya-e0102n8:93_0: Ye niruddhā marantassa, tiṭṭhamānassa vā idha;
anya-e0102n8:95_0: Anantarā ca ye bhaggā, ye ca bhaggā anāgate;
anya-e0102n8:105_1: Evaṁ āhāramayādīsu tilakkhaṇaṁ āropetvā puna dhammatārūpe tilakkhaṇaṁ āropeti.
anya-e0102n8:106_7: Tato nīlapaṇṇavaṇṇakālato paṭṭhāya sabhāgarūpasantatimanuppabandhāpayamānaṁ saṁvaccharamattena paṇḍupalāsaṁ hutvā vaṇṭato chijjitvā patati.
anya-e0102n8:107_0: So taṁ pariggahetvā ‘‘tanurattakāle pavattarūpaṁ ghanarattakālaṁ appatvā nirujjhati.
anya-e0102n8:107_7: Paṇḍupalāsakāle pavattaṁ vaṇṭato chijjitvā patanakālaṁ appatvāva nirujjhati,
anya-e0102n8:107_8: tasmā taṁ aniccaṁ dukkhamanattā’’ti tilakkhaṇaṁ āropeti,
anya-e0102n8:107_9: evaṁ tattha tilakkhaṇaṁ āropetvā iminā nayena sabbampi dhammatārūpaṁ sammasati.
anya-e0102n8:108_0: Evaṁ tāva rūpasattakavasena tilakkhaṇaṁ āropetvā saṅkhāre sammasati.
anya-e0102n8:111_3: ‘‘ye ime ‘kesā aniccā dukkhā anattā’ti sammasane uppannā phassapañcamakā dhammā,
anya-e0102n8:111_5: matthaluṅgaṁ aniccaṁ dukkhamanattā’ti sammasane uppannā phassapañcamakā dhammā,

anya-e0102n8:112_0: Ariyavaṁsakathāyaṁ pana ‘‘heṭṭhā rūpasattake sattasu ṭhānesu ‘rūpaṁ aniccaṁ dukkhamanattā’ti pavattaṁ
anya-e0102n8:112_1: cittaṁ aparena cittena ‘aniccaṁ dukkhamanattā’ti sammasanto ‘kalāpato sammasatī’ti’’ vuttaṁ,

anya-e0102n8:113_5: dhammatārūpaṁ ‘‘aniccaṁ dukkhamanattā’’ti sammasitvā tampi cittaṁ aparena cittena ‘‘aniccaṁ dukkhamanattā’’ti sammasati.
anya-e0102n8:114_0: 719.Khaṇikatoti idha bhikkhu ādānanikkheparūpaṁ ‘‘aniccaṁ dukkhamanattā’’ti sammasitvā taṁ paṭhamacittaṁ dutiyacittena,

anya-e0102n8:115_0: 720.Paṭipāṭitoti ādānanikkheparūpaṁ ‘‘aniccaṁ dukkhamanattā’’ti sammasitvā taṁ paṭhamacittaṁ dutiyacittena,
anya-e0102n8:115_7: dhammatārūpaṁ ‘‘aniccaṁ dukkhamanattā’’ti sammasitvā taṁ paṭhamacittaṁ dutiyacittena,
anya-e0102n8:115_10: dasamaṁ ekādasamena ‘‘etampi aniccaṁ dukkhamanattā’’ti evaṁ vipassanā paṭipāṭiyā sakalampi divasabhāgaṁ sammasituṁ vaṭṭeyya.
anya-e0102n8:115_11: Yāva dasamacittasammasanā pana rūpakammaṭṭhānampi arūpakammaṭṭhānampi paguṇaṁ hoti.
anya-e0102n8:116_0: 721.Diṭṭhiugghāṭanato mānaugghāṭanato nikantipariyādānatoti imesu tīsu visuṁ sammasananayo nāma natthi.
anya-e0102n8:116_3: taṁ passanto rūpārūpato uddhaṁ aññaṁ sattaṁ nāma na passati.
anya-e0102n8:116_4: Sattassa adassanato paṭṭhāya sattasaññā ugghāṭitā hoti.
anya-e0102n8:116_5: Sattasaññaṁ ugghāṭitacittena saṅkhāre pariggaṇhato diṭṭhi nuppajjati.
anya-e0102n8:116_6: Diṭṭhiyā anuppajjamānāya diṭṭhi ugghāṭitā nāma hoti.
anya-e0102n8:116_8: Māne anuppajjante māno samugghāṭito nāma hoti.
anya-e0102n8:116_10: Taṇhāya anuppajjantiyā nikanti pariyādiṇṇā nāma hotīti idaṁ tāva visuddhikathāyaṁ vuttaṁ.
anya-e0102n8:117_0: Ariyavaṁsakathāyaṁ pana ‘‘diṭṭhiugghāṭanato mānasamugghāṭanato nikantipariyādānato’’ti mātikaṁ ṭhapetvā ayaṁ nayo dassito.

anya-e0102n8:123_5: avasavattanaṭṭhena anattāti passato nikantipariyādānaṁ nāma hoti.
anya-e0102n8:124_0: Evaṁ saṅkhāre anattato passantassa diṭṭhisamugghāṭanaṁ nāma hoti.
anya-e0102n8:124_3: Iti ayaṁ vipassanā attano attano ṭhāneyeva tiṭṭhatīti.
anya-e0102n8:125_0: Evaṁ arūpasattakavasenāpi tilakkhaṇaṁ āropetvā saṅkhāre sammasati.
anya-e0102n8:125_1: Ettāvatā panassa rūpakammaṭṭhānampi arūpakammaṭṭhānampi paguṇaṁ hoti.
anya-e0102n8:126_1: So evaṁ paguṇarūpārūpakammaṭṭhāno yā upari bhaṅgānupassanato paṭṭhāya pahānapariññāvasena sabbākārato pattabbā aṭṭhārasa mahāvipassanā,
anya-e0102n8:126_2: tāsaṁ idheva tāva ekadesaṁ paṭivijjhanto tappaṭipakkhe dhamme pajahati.
anya-e0102n8:128_0: Tāsu yasmā iminā aniccādilakkhaṇattayavasena saṅkhārā diṭṭhā,
anya-e0102n8:128_2: Yasmā ca ‘‘yā ca aniccānupassanā yā ca animittānupassanā,
anya-e0102n8:128_5: Tathā ‘‘yā ca dukkhānupassanā yā ca appaṇihitānupassanā,
anya-e0102n8:130_1: taṁ sandhāya idaṁ vuttaṁ ‘‘evaṁ paguṇarūpārūpakammaṭṭhāno yā upari bhaṅgānupassanato paṭṭhāya pahānapariññāvasena
anya-e0102n8:130_3: Tāsaṁ idheva tāva ekadesaṁ paṭivijjhanto tappaṭipakkhe dhamme pajahatī’’ti.
anya-e0102n8:132_1: So evaṁ aniccānupassanādipaṭipakkhānaṁ niccasaññādīnaṁ pahānena visuddhañāṇo sammasanañāṇassa pāraṁ gantvā,
anya-e0102n8:132_2: yaṁ taṁ sammasanañāṇānantaraṁ ‘‘paccuppannānaṁ dhammānaṁ vipariṇāmānupassane paññā udayabbayānupassane ñāṇa’’nti (paṭi. ma.
anya-e0102n8:133_0: ‘‘Kathaṁ paccuppannānaṁ dhammānaṁ vipariṇāmānupassane paññā udayabbayānupassane ñāṇaṁ?
anya-e0102n8:134_0: So iminā pāḷinayena jātassa nāmarūpassa nibbattilakkhaṇaṁ jātiṁ uppādaṁ abhinavākāraṁ ‘‘udayo’’ti,
anya-e0102n8:134_2: So evaṁ pajānāti ‘‘imassa nāmarūpassa uppattito pubbe anuppannassa rāsi vā nicayo vā natthi,
anya-e0102n8:134_3: uppajjamānassāpi rāsito vā nicayato vā āgamanaṁ nāma natthi,
anya-e0102n8:134_5: niruddhassāpi ekasmiṁ ṭhāne rāsito nicayato nidhānato avaṭṭhānaṁ nāma natthi.
anya-e0102n8:134_6: Yathā pana vīṇāya vādiyamānāya uppannasaddassa neva uppattito pubbe sannicayo atthi,
anya-e0102n8:134_10: atha kho vīṇañca upavīṇañca purisassa ca tajjaṁ vāyāmaṁ paṭicca ahutvā sambhoti,
anya-e0102n8:134_12: Evaṁ sabbepi rūpārūpino dhammā ahutvā sambhonti,
anya-e0102n8:135_0: 724. Evaṁ saṅkhepato udayabbayamanasikāraṁ katvā puna yāni etasseva udayabbayañāṇassa vibhaṅge –
anya-e0102n8:136_3: āhārasamudayā rūpasamudayoti paccayasamudayaṭṭhena rūpakkhandhassa udayaṁ passati.
anya-e0102n8:136_5: Rūpakkhandhassa udayaṁ passanto imāni pañca lakkhaṇāni passati.
anya-e0102n8:137_3: āhāranirodhā rūpanirodhoti paccayanirodhaṭṭhena rūpakkhandhassa vayaṁ passati.
anya-e0102n8:137_5: Rūpakkhandhassa vayaṁ passantopi imāni pañca lakkhaṇāni passati’’ (paṭi. ma. 1.50).
anya-e0102n8:138_0: Tathā ‘‘avijjāsamudayā vedanāsamudayoti paccayasamudayaṭṭhena vedanākkhandhassa udayaṁ passati.
anya-e0102n8:138_3: phassasamudayā vedanāsamudayoti paccayasamudayaṭṭhena vedanākkhandhassa udayaṁ passati.
anya-e0102n8:138_5: Vedanākkhandhassa udayaṁ passanto imāni pañca lakkhaṇāni passati.
anya-e0102n8:138_9: phassanirodhā vedanānirodhoti paccayanirodhaṭṭhena vedanākkhandhassa vayaṁ passati.
anya-e0102n8:138_11: Vedanākkhandhassa vayaṁ passanto imāni pañca lakkhaṇāni passati’’ (paṭi. ma. 1.50).
anya-e0102n8:140_0: Evaṁ ekekassa khandhassa udayabbayadassane dasa dasa katvā paññāsa lakkhaṇāni vuttāni.
anya-e0102n8:140_1: Tesaṁ vasena evampi rūpassa udayo evampi rūpassa vayo,
anya-e0102n8:140_3: evampi rūpaṁ vetīti paccayato ceva khaṇato ca vitthārena manasikāraṁ karoti.
anya-e0102n8:141_1: Tassevaṁ manasikaroto ‘‘iti kirime dhammā ahutvā sambhonti,
anya-e0102n8:141_3: Tassevaṁ paccayato ceva khaṇato ca dvedhā udayabbayaṁ passato saccapaṭiccasamuppādanayalakkhaṇabhedā pākaṭā honti.
anya-e0102n8:142_4: Yaṁ pana nibbattilakkhaṇavipariṇāmalakkhaṇāni passanto khandhānaṁ udayabbayaṁ passati,
anya-e0102n8:143_1: Iccassevaṁ paccayato ceva khaṇato ca dvedhā udayabbayaṁ passato paccayato udayadassanena samudayasaccaṁ pākaṭaṁ hoti janakāvabodhato.
anya-e0102n8:143_2: Khaṇato udayadassanena dukkhasaccaṁ pākaṭaṁ hoti jātidukkhāvabodhato.
anya-e0102n8:143_3: Paccayato vayadassanena nirodhasaccaṁ pākaṭaṁ hoti paccayānuppādena paccayavataṁ anuppādāvabodhato.
anya-e0102n8:143_4: Khaṇato vayadassanena dukkhasaccameva pākaṭaṁ hoti maraṇadukkhāvabodhato.
anya-e0102n8:143_6: maggovāyaṁ lokikoti maggasaccaṁ pākaṭaṁ hoti tatra sammohavighātato.
anya-e0102n8:144_1: Paccayato cassa udayadassanena anulomo paṭiccasamuppādo pākaṭo hoti,
anya-e0102n8:144_2: ‘‘imasmiṁ sati idaṁ hotī’’ti (ma. ni. 1.404; saṁ. ni. 2.21; udā.
anya-e0102n8:144_4: Paccayato vayadassanena paṭilomo paṭiccasamuppādo pākaṭo hoti,
anya-e0102n8:144_5: ‘‘imassa nirodhā idaṁ nirujjhatī’’ti (ma. ni. 1.406; saṁ. ni. 2.21; udā.
anya-e0102n8:144_7: Khaṇato pana udayabbayadassanena paṭiccasamuppannā dhammā pākaṭā honti saṅkhatalakkhaṇāvabodhato.
anya-e0102n8:145_1: Paccayato cassa udayadassanena ekattanayo pākaṭo hoti hetuphalasambandhena santānassa anupacchedāvabodhato.
anya-e0102n8:145_3: Khaṇato udayadassanena nānattanayo pākaṭo hoti navanavānaṁ uppādāvabodhato.
anya-e0102n8:145_5: Paccayato cassa udayabbayadassanena abyāpāranayo pākaṭo hoti dhammānaṁ avasavattibhāvāvabodhato.
anya-e0102n8:145_7: Paccayato pana udayadassanena evaṁdhammatānayo pākaṭo hoti paccayānurūpena phalassa uppādāvabodhato.
anya-e0102n8:146_1: Paccayato cassa udayadassanena anattalakkhaṇaṁ pākaṭaṁ hoti dhammānaṁ nirīhakattapaccayapaṭibaddhavuttitāvabodhato.
anya-e0102n8:146_2: Khaṇato udayabbayadassanena aniccalakkhaṇaṁ pākaṭaṁ hoti hutvā abhāvāvabodhato,
anya-e0102n8:146_6: Sabhāvalakkhaṇe saṅkhatalakkhaṇassa tāvakālikattampi pākaṭaṁ hoti udayakkhaṇe vayassa,
anya-e0102n8:147_1: Tassevaṁ pākaṭībhūtasaccapaṭiccasamuppādanayalakkhaṇabhedassa ‘‘evaṁ kira nāmime dhammā anuppannapubbā uppajjanti,
anya-e0102n8:147_2: uppannā nirujjhantī’’ti niccanavāva hutvā saṅkhārā upaṭṭhahanti.
anya-e0102n8:147_4: sūriyuggamane ussāvabindu viya udakabubbuḷo viya udake daṇḍarāji viya āragge sāsapo viya vijjuppādo viya ca parittaṭṭhāyino.
anya-e0102n8:148_1: uppannañca vayaṁ upetī’’ti iminā ākārena samapaññāsa lakkhaṇāni paṭivijjhitvā ṭhitaṁ udayabbayānupassanaṁ nāma taruṇavipassanāñāṇaṁ adhigataṁ hoti,
anya-e0102n8:150_1: Athassa imāya taruṇavipassanāya āraddhavipassakassa dasa vipassanupakkilesā uppajjanti.
anya-e0102n8:150_2: Vipassanupakkilesā hi paṭivedhappattassa ariyasāvakassa ceva vippaṭipannakassa ca nikkhittakammaṭṭhānassa kusītapuggalassa nuppajjanti.
anya-e0102n8:150_3: Sammāpaṭipannakassa pana yuttapayuttassa āraddhavipassakassa kulaputtassa uppajjantiyeva.
anya-e0102n8:151_0: Katame pana te dasa upakkilesāti? Obhāso, ñāṇaṁ, pīti,
anya-e0102n8:152_4: Tena uddhaccena viggahitamānaso aniccato upaṭṭhānaṁ yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti. Dukkhato…
anya-e0102n8:153_7: Tena uddhaccena viggahitamānaso aniccato upaṭṭhānaṁ yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti. Dukkhato…
anya-e0102n8:154_2: Tasmiṁ uppanne yogāvacaro ‘‘na vata me ito pubbe evarūpo obhāso uppannapubbo,
anya-e0102n8:154_5: Tassa amaggaṁ ‘‘maggo’’ti aphalaṁ ‘‘phala’’nti gaṇhato vipassanāvīthi ukkantā nāma hoti.
anya-e0102n8:154_6: So attano mūlakammaṭṭhānaṁ vissajjetvā obhāsameva assādento nisīdati.
anya-e0102n8:155_0: So kho panāyaṁ obhāso kassaci bhikkhuno pallaṅkaṭṭhānamattameva obhāsento uppajjati.
anya-e0102n8:155_7: kassaci pathavītalato yāva akaniṭṭhabrahmalokā ekālokaṁ kurumāno.
anya-e0102n8:156_1: cittalapabbate kira dvikuṭṭagehassa anto dve therā nisīdiṁsu.
anya-e0102n8:156_6: mayhaṁ idāni cetiyaṅgaṇamhi sīhāsane pañcavaṇṇāni kusumāni paññāyantī’’ti.
anya-e0102n8:156_9: mayhaṁ panetarahi mahāsamuddamhi yojanaṭṭhāne macchakacchapā paññāyantī’’ti.
anya-e0102n8:157_0: Ayaṁ pana vipassanupakkileso yebhuyyena samathavipassanālābhino uppajjati.
anya-e0102n8:157_1: So samāpattivikkhambhitānaṁ kilesānaṁ asamudācārato ‘‘arahā aha’’nti cittaṁ uppādeti uccavālikavāsī mahānāgatthero
anya-e0102n8:157_2: viya haṁkanakavāsī mahādattatthero viya cittalapabbate niṅkapeṇṇakapadhānagharavāsī cūḷasumanatthero viya ca.
anya-e0102n8:158_1: talaṅgaravāsī dhammadinnatthero kira nāma eko pabhinnapaṭisambhido mahākhīṇāsavo mahato bhikkhusaṅghassa ovādadāyako ahosi.
anya-e0102n8:158_2: So ekadivasaṁ attano divāṭṭhāne nisīditvā ‘‘kinnu kho amhākaṁ ācariyassa uccavālikavāsīmahānāgattherassa samaṇabhāvakiccaṁ matthakaṁ pattaṁ,
anya-e0102n8:158_3: no’’ti āvajjanto puthujjanabhāvamevassa disvā ‘‘mayi agacchante puthujjanakālakiriyameva karissatī’’ti
anya-e0102n8:158_4: ca ñatvā iddhiyā vehāsaṁ uppatitvā divāṭṭhāne nisinnassa therassa samīpe orohitvā vanditvā vattaṁ dassetvā
anya-e0102n8:159_2: kadā tumhehi ayaṁ dhammo adhigato’’ti vutte ‘‘ito saṭṭhivassakāle,
anya-e0102n8:159_8: Thero sabbasetaṁ hatthiṁ māpesi. Idāni, bhante,
anya-e0102n8:159_9: yathā ayaṁ hatthī añcitakaṇṇo pasāritanaṅguṭṭho soṇḍaṁ mukhe pakkhipitvā bheravaṁ koñcanādaṁ karonto tumhākaṁ abhimukho āgacchati,
anya-e0102n8:159_11: Thero tathā katvā vegena āgacchato hatthissa bheravaṁ ākāraṁ disvā uṭṭhāya palāyituṁ āraddho.
anya-e0102n8:159_12: Tamenaṁ khīṇāsavatthero hatthaṁ pasāretvā cīvarakaṇṇe gahetvā ‘‘bhante,
anya-e0102n8:160_0: So tamhi kāle attano puthujjanabhāvaṁ ñatvā ‘‘avassayo me, āvuso,
anya-e0102n8:160_1: dhammadinna hohī’’ti vatvā pādamūle ukkuṭikaṁ nisīdi. ‘‘Bhante,
anya-e0102n8:160_4: Thero kammaṭṭhānaṁ gahetvā caṅkamaṁ āruyha tatiye padavāre aggaphalaṁ arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.
anya-e0102n8:161_1: Tassa kira rūpārūpadhamme tulayantassa tīrentassa vissaṭṭhaindavajiramiva avihatavegaṁ tikhiṇaṁ sūraṁ ativisadaṁ ñāṇaṁ uppajjati.
anya-e0102n8:162_5: pharaṇāpītīti ayaṁ pañcavidhā pīti sakalasarīraṁ pūrayamānā uppajjati.
anya-e0102n8:163_1: Tassa kira tasmiṁ samaye rattiṭṭhāne vā divāṭṭhāne vā nisinnassa kāyacittānaṁ neva daratho,
anya-e0102n8:163_7: atha kho panassa kāyacittāni passaddhāni lahūni mudūni kammaññāni suvisadāni ujukāniyeva honti.
anya-e0102n8:163_8: So imehi passaddhādīhi anuggahitakāyacitto tasmiṁ samaye amānusiṁ nāma ratiṁ anubhavati.
anya-e0102n8:165_0: Amānusī rati hoti, sammā dhammaṁ vipassato.
anya-e0102n8:167_0: Labhatī pītipāmojjaṁ, amataṁ taṁ vijānata’’nti. (dha. pa. 373-374);
anya-e0102n8:168_0: Evamassa imaṁ amānusiṁ ratiṁ sādhayamānā lahutādisampayuttā passaddhi uppajjati.
anya-e0102n8:169_1: Tassa kira tasmiṁ samaye sakalasarīraṁ abhisandayamānaṁ atipaṇītaṁ sukhaṁ uppajjati.
anya-e0102n8:170_1: Vipassanāsampayuttāyeva hissa cittacetasikānaṁ atisayapasādabhūtā balavatī saddhā uppajjati.
anya-e0102n8:171_1: Vipassanāsampayuttameva hissa asithilaṁ anaccāraddhaṁ supaggahitaṁ vīriyaṁ uppajjati.
anya-e0102n8:172_1: Vipassanāsampayuttāyeva hissa supaṭṭhitā supatiṭṭhitā nikhātā acalā pabbatarājasadisā sati uppajjati.
anya-e0102n8:172_2: So yaṁ yaṁ ṭhānaṁ āvajjati samannāharati manasikaroti paccavekkhati,
anya-e0102n8:172_3: taṁ taṁ ṭhānamassa okkhanditvā pakkhanditvā dibbacakkhuno paraloko viya satiyā upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0102n8:173_1: Tasmiṁ hissa samaye sabbasaṅkhāresu majjhattabhūtā vipassanupekkhāpi balavatī uppajjati.
anya-e0102n8:173_3: Sā hissa taṁ taṁ ṭhānaṁ āvajjantassa vissaṭṭhaindavajiramiva pattapuṭe pakkhitta tattanārāco viya ca sūrā tikhiṇā hutvā vahati.
anya-e0102n8:174_1: Evaṁ obhāsādipaṭimaṇḍitāya hissa vipassanāya ālayaṁ kurumānā sukhumā santākārā nikanti uppajjati.
anya-e0102n8:174_2: Yā nikanti kilesoti pariggahetumpi na sakkā hoti.
anya-e0102n8:175_1: evaṁ etesupi aññatarasmiṁ uppanne yogāvacaro ‘‘na vata me ito pubbe evarūpaṁ ñāṇaṁ uppannapubbaṁ,
anya-e0102n8:175_7: addhā maggappattosmi phalappattosmī’’ti amaggameva ‘‘maggo’’ti aphalameva ca ‘‘phala’’nti gaṇhāti.
anya-e0102n8:175_8: Tassa amaggaṁ ‘‘maggo’’ti aphalaṁ ‘‘phala’’nti gaṇhato vipassanāvīthi ukkantā nāma hoti.
anya-e0102n8:175_9: So attano mūlakammaṭṭhānaṁ vissajjetvā nikantimeva assādento nisīdatīti.
anya-e0102n8:176_1: Ettha ca obhāsādayo upakkilesavatthutāya upakkilesāti vuttā,
anya-e0102n8:176_3: Nikanti pana upakkileso ceva upakkilesavatthu ca.
anya-e0102n8:176_6: ‘‘Mama obhāso uppanno’’ti gaṇhato hi diṭṭhigāho hoti,
anya-e0102n8:176_10: Tathā sesesupīti evaṁ gāhavasena samatiṁsa upakkilesā honti.
anya-e0102n8:176_11: Tesaṁ vasena akusalo abyatto yogāvacaro obhāsādīsu kampati vikkhipati.
anya-e0102n8:177_0: ‘‘Obhāse ceva ñāṇe ca, pītiyā ca vikampati;
anya-e0102n8:178_0: Passaddhiyā sukhe ceva, yehi cittaṁ pavedhati.
anya-e0102n8:182_1: Kusalo pana paṇḍito byatto buddhisampanno yogāvacaro obhāsādīsu uppannesu ‘‘ayaṁ kho me obhāso uppanno,
anya-e0102n8:182_2: so kho panāyaṁ anicco saṅkhato paṭiccasamuppanno khayadhammo vayadhammo virāgadhammo nirodhadhammo’’ti iti vā taṁ paññāya paricchindati upaparikkhati.
anya-e0102n8:182_9: uppādavayapaṭipīḷanaṭṭhena dukkho’’ti sabbaṁ arūpasattake vuttanayena vitthāretabbaṁ.
anya-e0102n8:183_8: Evaṁ samanupassanto obhāsādīsu na kampati na vedhati.
anya-e0102n8:185_0: Dhammuddhaccakusalo hoti, na ca vikkhepaṁ gacchatī’’ti. (paṭi. ma. 2.7);
anya-e0102n8:186_0: So evaṁ vikkhepaṁ agacchanto taṁ samatiṁsavidhaṁ upakkilesajaṭaṁ vijaṭetvā obhāsādayo dhammā na maggo.
anya-e0102n8:186_1: Upakkilesavimuttaṁ pana vīthipaṭipannaṁ vipassanāñāṇaṁ maggoti maggañca amaggañca vavatthapeti.
anya-e0102n8:186_3: ayaṁ na maggo’’ti maggañca amaggañca ñatvā ṭhitaṁ ñāṇaṁ maggāmaggañāṇadassanavisuddhīti veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0102n8:187_0: Ettāvatā ca pana tena tiṇṇaṁ saccānaṁ vavatthānaṁ kataṁ hoti. Kathaṁ?
anya-e0102n8:187_1: Diṭṭhivisuddhiyaṁ tāva nāmarūpassa vavatthāpanena dukkhasaccassa vavatthānaṁ kataṁ.
anya-e0102n8:187_3: Imissaṁ maggāmaggañāṇadassanavisuddhiyaṁ sammāmaggassa avadhāraṇena maggasaccassa vavatthānaṁ katanti,
anya-e0102n8:187_4: evaṁ lokiyeneva tāva ñāṇena tiṇṇaṁ saccānaṁ vavatthānaṁ kataṁ hoti.
